name: Bitter Lupin
description: Bitter lupin is a type of legume that is native to the Mediterranean region. It is a good source of protein and is low in fat. Bitter lupin is also a good source of fiber, which helps to keep you feeling full and satisfied. It is a great addition to any meal and can be used in a variety of dishes.

name: Desi Chick Peas
description: Desi chick peas are a type of legume that is native to India. They are a good source of protein and are low in fat. Desi chick peas are also a good source of fiber, which helps to keep you feeling full and satisfied. They are a great addition to any meal and can be used in a variety of dishes.
